### **Software**


* [**cquad**](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/cquad/index.html){target="_blank"}: Conditional Maximum Likelihood for Quadratic Exponential Models for Binary Panel Data. [R](https://www.r-project.org/){target="_blank"} package.

* [**cquadr**](https://ideas.repec.org/c/boc/bocode/s458852.html){target="_blank"}: Stata module to estimate Quadratic Exponential models running the cquad R package. [Stata](https://www.stata.com/){target="_blank"} module. [User's Guide](https://github.com/fravale/cquadr/blob/master/cquadr-guide.pdf){target="_blank"} and [code](https://github.com/fravale/cquadr){target="_blank"} are also available in my GitHub repository.

* [**FLS**](https://gretl.sourceforge.net/current_fnfiles/FLS.zip): Flexible Least Squares.
[gretl](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/){target="_blank"} function package. [Documentation](https://gretl.sourceforge.net/current_fnfiles/unzipped/FLS.pdf) is available.  

* [**ketvals**](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/current_fnfiles/ketvals.zip): Kernel-based Time-Varying Least Squares. [gretl](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/){target="_blank"} function package. [Documentation](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/current_fnfiles/unzipped/ketvals.pdf){target="_blank"} is available.

* [**spm**](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/current_fnfiles/spm.zip): Spatial Regression Models. [gretl](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/){target="_blank"} function package. A related [article](http://www.fedoa.unina.it/12338/1/GRETL2019.pdf#page=33){target="_blank"} and [documentation](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/current_fnfiles/unzipped/spm.pdf){target="_blank"} are available.
